name: Dead Loop Demo
description:
Our team consists of two people at the moment - a designer and a programmer. Due to the shortage of people, all the game making burden falls on our shoulders, which slows down the development speed considerably.

Contact us on : darkestdesirestudio@gmail.com

Feedback is welcome!

We'd like to hear from you! If you've got a suggestion or a comment to make regarding Dead Loop, you're more than welcome to let us know in the comments! Thank you!!
